EmailTemplate.description: This template should ONLY be used to respond back to an external Customer. This template should be used if the Customer requested to escalate their out of policy quantity decrease request to the Customer Business Team (CBT) and the CBT has failed to respond within (7) calendar days of escalation to the CBT.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Qty Decrease – Outside-of-policy, Final Response to EXTERNAL Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Line Quantity Decrease Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause but we are unable to push the decrease the quantities on your order. Keeping order requirements stable is critical to ensure exceptional delivery performance to our Customers.
If you require additional support, please feel free to engage your current Customer Support/Account Manager.
Your PO#: <Enter Customer PO#> Honeywell Sales Order #: <Enter SAP SO#>
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, if you need to reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
